backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining timeline, task, routine, and cycle types with user-specific event stores, access control, and build info plus profile APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for runtime mode and OMNIBRAIN behavior changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend OMNITRACE files covering storage, engine, analytics, UI, and privacy modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions providing light and dark mode color variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION.md: Production deployment checklist detailing version verification, cache clearing steps, and post-deployment validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling session initialization, error recovery, and routing between all OMNITRACE screens.
frontend/src/constants/buildInfo.ts: Defines the frontend build label used in version display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating and refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuildInfo.ts: Fetches build info from the backend using the actor, with retry, caching, and refetch rules.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useStopwatch.ts: Implements a stopwatch with start, pause, reset, and real‑time elapsed tracking via requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimer.ts: Provides a countdown timer with start, pause, reset, duration setting, and completion detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, and custom UI effects including cognitive glow, focus rings, and color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/categoryBrea: Computes total and percentage time spent per category by analyzing derived segments.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/dailySummary: Generates deterministic daily insights from event segments, detecting focus windows, distractions, rest patterns, and recovery gaps.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/driftDetecti: Detects cognitive drift by analyzing focus duration consistency and distraction clustering, returning recommendations when patterns appear.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/focusScore.t: Computes a 0–100 focus score from event-derived segments, applying duration, distraction, rest, and switching heuristics to return a labeled result.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/heatmap.ts: Generates a mental-load heatmap by binning time, weighting segment categories, and smoothing intensity values.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/insights.ts: Produces high-level insights such as most frequent activity, longest focus session, context switches, and peak productivity hours from segments.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/metrics.ts: Calculates session metrics including active/background/idle time, context switches, and focus density based on event transitions.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/smartMerging: Merges raw segments into higher-level patterns like Exploration Sessions, Micro-Distractions, or Recovery Gaps based on cognitive mode thresholds.
frontend/src/omni/analytics/titles.ts: Awards micro-gamification titles like Flow Architect or Focus Breaker by analyzing focus duration, distractions, and merged segment patterns.
frontend/src/omni/engine/idleDetection.t: Tracks user idle/active state via interaction events and logs IDLE_START/IDLE_END events with automatic confidence.
frontend/src/omni/engine/queries.ts: Provides filtered event queries and nearest-event lookup using ledger storage with optional category, confidence, and keyword filters.
frontend/src/omni/engine/timeEngine.ts: Derives deterministic activity segments from events and supports retrieving the active segment at a timestamp.
Builds a forensic timeline by querying events, deriving and merging segments, and identifying time gaps.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useCognitiveMode: React hook that manages cognitive mode with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useHeatmapZoom.t: Provides zoom state and handlers for wheel and pinch gestures to adjust heatmap bin density.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useOmniBrainRunt: Manages OMNIBRAIN runtime mode (local vs API) with storage, events, and cross-component updates.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useSmoothedFocus: Smoothly animates focus score and label changes using lerp unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/omni/hooks/useTodayOmniEven: Loads today’s events and refreshes them periodically with error/loading tracking.
frontend/src/omni/instrumentation/contex: Stores and returns the current instrumentation context for screen and mode.
frontend/src/omni/instrumentation/logger: Creates and appends timestamped OmniEvents for centralized logging.
Provides localStorage-based persistence for chat messages with confidence and follow-up fields.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/contextScope: Computes time ranges for today/week/all and loads events for a given scope.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/engine.ts: Detects user intent and generates assistant responses, including routing external-AI queries to an unavailable response.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/helpSearch.t: Keyword tokenizer and scorer for retrieving relevant knowledge base entries.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/instrumentat: Logs OMNIBRAIN open and submit actions with contextual metadata.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/knowledgeBas: Static help articles with titles, keywords, and answers for OMNIBRAIN queries.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/modes.ts: Defines intelligence modes with labels/descriptions and a renderer that formats facts differently per mode.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/suggestedQue: Provides a fixed list of deterministic English suggested user questions.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/templates.ts: Generates structured fact payloads about distractions and focus drops using derived segments and metrics.
frontend/src/omni/omnibrain/useOmniBrain: React hook managing chat messages with persistent storage and basic CRUD operations.
frontend/src/omni/privacy/export.ts: Implements full data export to JSON and CSV by reading events, sessions, and metadata from storage.
frontend/src/omni/privacy/privateMode.ts: Manages a boolean Private Mode flag in localStorage with toggle and helpers.
frontend/src/omni/privacy/wipe.ts: Provides full data wipe functions, logging a wipe event and handling recovery-safe deletion.
frontend/src/omni/search/index.ts: Runs local event search with composable filters mapped to queryEvents and duration post-filters.
frontend/src/omni/search/presets.ts: Defines preset search filters for common anomaly queries like long idle or manual events.
frontend/src/omni/session/sessionTracker: Tracks session lifecycle and visibility changes, persisting session events to storage.
frontend/src/omni/session/startup.ts: Initializes storage, performs recovery, starts a new session, and sets up session tracking.
frontend/src/omni/storage/idb.ts: Provides IndexedDB storage with idempotent init, CRUD for events/sessions, and crash-safe metadata updates.
frontend/src/omni/storage/ledger.ts: Thin wrapper for appending and reading events through the IndexedDB storage layer.
frontend/src/omni/storage/recovery.ts: Performs startup recovery by closing unclosed sessions and logging a recovery event.
frontend/src/omni/types.ts: Defines core data model types including events, sessions, segments, metadata, and enums.
frontend/src/omni/ui/AppShell.tsx: Provides the main app layout with header controls, navigation tabs, focus score, private mode, and cognitive mode handling.
frontend/src/omni/ui/categoryColors.ts: Defines category-specific colors and labels using harmonized oklch palettes.
frontend/src/omni/ui/CognitiveModeSwitch: Renders a pill-style switch to toggle between cognitive modes like focus, flow, recovery, and analysis.
frontend/src/omni/ui/DailySummaryCard.ts: Displays a card listing daily insights generated from a DailySummary object.
frontend/src/omni/ui/FocusScoreRing.tsx: Shows a focus score ring with dynamic styling or a fallback message when insufficient data is available.
frontend/src/omni/ui/HeatmapBar.tsx: Draws a horizontal heatmap on a canvas using bins and an Indigo→Cyan→Red color scale.
frontend/src/omni/ui/HeatmapZoomControls: Provides zoom-in/out buttons and a slider to adjust heatmap zoom level.
frontend/src/omni/ui/PrivateModeToggle.t: Button that toggles the application's private mode state with an eye icon indicator.
frontend/src/omni/ui/States.tsx: Collection of reusable components for loading, empty, inline notice, and startup error UI states.
frontend/src/omni/ui/timelineCognitiveSt: Computes cognitive style parameters (intensity, glow, elevation) for timeline items and exposes CSS variable helpers.
frontend/src/omni/ui/TitlesStrip.tsx: Displays a row of user titles using badges, or nothing if no titles exist.
frontend/src/screens/ActivityMapScreen.t: Activity map screen that loads events, supports date-range filtering, and shows category breakdown with UI controls.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Displays session metrics, insights, summaries, titles, and drift detection with date-range queries for events.
frontend/src/screens/ForensicScreen.tsx: Provides a UI to reconstruct and browse detailed event timelines within a selected time window.
frontend/src/screens/ManualEventDialog.t: Dialog for creating manual events with title, category, timing, duration, keywords, and notes.
frontend/src/screens/OmniBrainScreen.tsx: Chat interface for the OmniBrain assistant supporting context scopes, intelligence modes, history, and runtime-mode handling.
frontend/src/screens/SearchScreen.tsx: Advanced event search screen with filters, presets, and result listing.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Renders the Privacy & Control settings UI with build info, OMNIBRAIN runtime mode, data export, data wipe, and backend version mismatch handling.
frontend/src/screens/StopwatchTimerScree: Provides stopwatch and countdown timer functionality with formatted time display, adjustable duration, and basic controls.
frontend/src/screens/TimelineScreen.tsx: Displays the live timeline with filtering, cognitive mode styling, heatmap view, smart merging, and manual event entry support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, constraints, known issues, and existing features for the OMNITRACE system.
